languages.text: {n}Дознаватель усмехается.{/n} "А я за вами. Раз декларация намерений состоялась, я повторю — кто вы?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель усмехается.{/n} "А я за вами. Раз декларация намерений состоялась, я повторю — кто вы?"

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель усмехается.{/n} "А я за вами. Раз декларация намерений состоялась, я повторю — кто вы?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"
{n}The interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"
{n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"
{n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"
{n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"

languages.text: {n}审讯官笑了起来。{/n}“我也同样会始终盯着你的。既然我们都已经表明了来意，那请允许我再问一遍：你是什么人？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}审讯官笑了起来。{/n}“我也同样会始终盯着你的。既然我们都已经表明了来意，那请允许我再问一遍：你是什么人？”

languages.text: {n}El interrogador se ríe.{/n} «Y yo {mf|le|la} estaré observando también. Ahora que hemos declarado nuestras intenciones, repito mi pregunta: ¿quién es usted?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador se ríe.{/n} «Y yo {mf|le|la} estaré observando también. Ahora que hemos declarado nuestras intenciones, repito mi pregunta: ¿quién es usted?».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは含み笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「俺も監視させてもらうとしよう。さて、互いの意思表示が済んだところでまた聞かせてもらおうか。お前は何者だ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは含み笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「俺も監視させてもらうとしよう。さて、互いの意思表示が済んだところでまた聞かせてもらおうか。お前は何者だ？」

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur pousse un petit rire.{/n} « J'en ferai de même avec vous. Maintenant que nos intentions respectives sont claires, laissez-moi vous reposer la question : qui êtes-vous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur pousse un petit rire.{/n} « J'en ferai de même avec vous. Maintenant que nos intentions respectives sont claires, laissez-moi vous reposer la question : qui êtes-vous ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator kichert.{/n} "Und ich werde Euch im Auge behalten. Da wir nun unsere Absichten kundgetan haben, frage ich erneut: Wer seid Ihr?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator kichert.{/n} "Und ich werde Euch im Auge behalten. Da wir nun unsere Absichten kundgetan haben, frage ich erneut: Wer seid Ihr?"

languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu hafifçe gülüyor.{/n} "Bilmukabele. Niyetlerimizi açık ettiğimize göre tekrar sorayım: Kimsiniz?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator chuckles.{/n} "And I will be watching you. Now that we have declared our intent, let me ask again: who are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu hafifçe gülüyor.{/n} "Bilmukabele. Niyetlerimizi açık ettiğimize göre tekrar sorayım: Kimsiniz?"
